page.title: 03About Our School.
page.content: Chelsfield is an old school.It has 3 teachers and 60 children.It is a village school and is very small.There are 2 playgrounds and behind the outside toilets is a patch of lawn where we play in the summer.On the grass there is also some steel framed gymnastic apparatus.Mrs.Richadrson is the headmistress and Mr.Eshelby is the Deputy head. I think our school is very nice even if it is very small.When you look at our school it looks like a house with a front door and little windows.Go upstairs and there are some little rooms where the headmaster used to live.Now it is Mrs.Richardson's and the teacher's rooms,Mrs Quantic also has her office there too.Simon thinks it is where the bedrooms are because you have to go upstairs to get there.
